mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e2.booking_id FROM spc_event e1 JOIN spc_event e2 ON e1.id != e2.id AND e1.space_id = e2.space_id AND ( (e1.start_time < e2.end_time AND e1.end_time > e2.start_time) ) WHERE e1.closure_id = #{closureId} AND e2.type = 0;

SELECT * FROM spc_event e WHERE ( (e.end_time BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime}) OR (e.start_time BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime}) OR (e.start_time < #{startDateTime} AND e.end_time > #{endDateTime}) );
